name: Paytm Cashback Scam
description: Scammer impersonates Paytm customer support offering a fake cashback reward, then asks victim to share UPI details and make a small payment to 'verify' their account.

turns.scammer_message: Congratulations! You have won a cashback of Rs. 5000 from Paytm. To claim your reward, please verify your UPI details. This is from official customer support.
turns.notes: Initial bait message using cashback lure and fake official branding.

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for your interest! To process your Rs 5000 cashback, we need to verify your UPI account. Please send a test payment of Rs 1 to our verification UPI ID: cashback.scam@fakeupi and your cashback will be credited within 5 minutes.
turns.notes: Scammer reveals the fake UPI ID and asks victim to send money to it.

turns.scammer_message: Sir, this is a completely safe and official process. Paytm does this for all cashback winners. If you are having any trouble, you can also call our support team at +91-8765432109 for assistance. Please complete the verification quickly, the offer expires in 10 minutes.
turns.notes: Scammer adds urgency and provides a fake phone number for 'support'.

turns.scammer_message: I understand your concern but this is 100% genuine. Many customers have already claimed their cashback today. Just send Rs 1 to cashback.scam@fakeupi and you will receive Rs 5000 immediately. This is our official verification process as per RBI guidelines.
turns.notes: Scammer repeats UPI ID and uses false authority (RBI) to convince victim.

turns.scammer_message: This is your last chance! The cashback offer of Rs 5000 will expire in 2 minutes. Send Re 1 now to cashback.scam@fakeupi or call +91-8765432109. Don't miss this opportunity, it won't come again!
turns.notes: Final pressure with urgency, repeating both UPI ID and phone number.
